Description: You send a ghostly energy at a creature that does additional damage to those affected by status conditions. Make a ranged attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. If the target is affected by a status condition, double your MOVE modifier when adding damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
